languages.text:
Whenever a vessel is inside this cloud of gas and dust, its aiming and firing capabilities are reduced. This cloud also conceals the vessel's position, making it more difficult for its enemies to hit that vessel. Specifically, the Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} also has its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} reduced.
{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Evasion{/g}: +30%
{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manoeuvrability{/g}: −1
Speed: −3 (the Rogue Trader's flagship only)
Hit chance: −25%
Range: −3
languages.original_text:
Evasion +30
Inertia -1
Speed -3 (only Players Starship)
HitChance -25
FiringArcRange -3
Газопылевое облако создает помехи для прицеливания и стрельбы из него и снижает срорость корабля. Но так же плотный туман создает помехи для видимости тем самым по цели в облаке сложнее попасть.

traits.locale_text:
The gas-dust cloud interferes with aiming and firing from it and reduces the speed of the ship. But dense fog also interferes with visibility, making it more difficult to hit a target in the cloud.
Evasion +30
Inertia -1
Speed -3 (only Players Starship)
HitChance -25
FiringArcRange -3

Whenever a vessel gets inside this cloud of gas and dust, its capabilities of taking aim and firing are reduced. Also, this cloud conceals the vessel's position making it more difficult for its enemies to hit that vessel. If the Rogue Trader's flagship gets into this zone, its speed is reduced.
Evasion: +30%
Manoeuvrability: −1
Speed: −3 (the Rogue Trader's flagship only)
Hit chance: −25%
Range: −3

Whenever a vessel gets inside this cloud of gas and dust, its capabilities of taking aim and firing are reduced. Also, this cloud conceals the vessel's position making it more difficult for its enemies to hit that vessel. If the Rogue Trader's flagship gets into this zone, its speed is reduced.
Evasion: +30%
Manoeuvrability: −1
Speed: −3 (the Rogue Trader's flagship only)
Hit chance: −25%
Range: −3

Whenever a vessel is inside this cloud of gas and dust, its aiming and firing capabilities are reduced. This cloud also conceals the vessel's position, making it more difficult for its enemies to hit that vessel. Specifically, the Rogue Trader's flagship also has its speed reduced.
Evasion: +30%
Manoeuvrability: −1
Speed: −3 (the Rogue Trader's flagship only)
Hit chance: −25%
Range: −3

Evasion: +30%

Evasion +30
Inertia -1
Speed -3 (only Players Starship)
HitChance -25
FiringArcRange -3
Газопылевое облако создает помехи для прицеливания и стрельбы из него и снижает срорость корабля. Но так же плотный туман создает помехи для видимости тем самым по цели в облаке сложнее попасть.

languages.text:
Когда корабль попадает внутрь газопылевого облака, это осложняет для него стрельбу и прицеливание. Но облако скрывает позицию самого корабля, поэтому противникам также становится труднее в него попасть. Корабль Вольного Торговца в таком облаке замедляется.
Уклонение: +30%
Маневренность: −1
Скорость: −3 (только для флагмана Вольного Торговца)
Шанс попадания: −25%
Дальность: −3

languages.text:
Befindet sich ein Schiff in dieser Wolke aus Gas und Staub, sind seine Ziel- und Feuersysteme gestört. Da diese Wolke die Position des Schiffes verbirgt, fällt es Gegnern schwerer, es unter Beschuss zu nehmen. Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}fliegt außerdem mit reduzierter {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeit{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g}: +30 %
{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g}: −1
Geschwindigkeit: −3 (nur Flaggschiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin})
Trefferchance: −25 %
Reichweite: −3

languages.text:
Ce nuage de gaz et de poussières réduit la précision et la puissance des vaisseaux dans sa zone d'effet, mais dissimule également leur position et les rend plus difficiles à toucher. Réduit également la {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse de déplacement{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Évitement{/g} : +30 %
{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manœuvrabilité{/g} : −1
Vitesse : −3 (vaisseau amiral uniquement)
Chances de toucher : −25 %
Portée : −3

languages.text:
Cada vez que una nave se halle dentro de esta nube de gas y polvo, disminuye su capacidad para apuntar y disparar. La nube también oculta la posición de la nave, haciendo que a los enemigos les resulte más difícil alcanzarla con sus disparos. En concreto, la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente también sufre una reducción de {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Esquiva{/g}: +30 %
{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Maniobrabilidad{/g}: −1
Velocidad: −3 (solo a la nave insignia {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente)
Probabilidad de impacto: −25 %
Alcance: −3

languages.text:
艦船がこのガスと塵の雲の中にいるときは常に、照準と射撃能力が低下する。また、この雲は船の位置を隠し、敵による攻撃が船に命中しづらくする。特に、自由開拓者の{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}も低下する。
{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}： +30%
{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}： -1
速度： -3（ローグ・トレーダーの旗艦のみ）
命中率： -25%
命中範囲： -3
languages.original_text:
Whenever a vessel is inside this cloud of gas and dust, its aiming and firing capabilities are reduced. This cloud also conceals the vessel's position, making it more difficult for its enemies to hit that vessel. Specifically, the Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} also has its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} reduced.

{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manoeuvrability{/g}: −1
Speed: −3 (the Rogue Trader's flagship only)
Hit chance: −25%
Range: −3

艦船がこのガスと塵の雲の中にいるときは常に、照準と射撃能力が低下する。また、この雲は船の位置を隠し、敵による攻撃が船に命中しづらくする。特に、自由開拓者の{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}も低下する。

languages.text:
处于气体尘埃云区域的舰船，瞄准能力与射击能力会受到影响。此外，气体尘埃云会隐藏舰船的位置，让敌人更加难以命中舰船。除此之外，行商浪人{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}还会降低。
{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避率{/g}：+30%
{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}：-1
速度：-3（仅限行商浪人的旗舰）
命中率：-25%
射程：-3

This cloud also conceals the vessel's position, making it more difficult for its enemies to hit that vessel. Specifically, the Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} also has its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} reduced.

Speed: −3 (the Rogue Trader's flagship only)
Hit chance: −25%
Range: −3

languages.text:
Bir gemi, bu gaz ve toz bulutunun içine girdiğinde hedefleme ve ateşleme kabiliyetleri düşer. Bu bulut aynı zamanda geminin konumunu gizleyerek düşmanların onu vurabilmesini güçleştirir. Ayrıca özellikle Hür Tacir'in {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}sancak gemisinin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}hızını{/g} da azaltır.
{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Sıyrılma{/g}: +%30
{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manevra kabiliyeti{/g}: −1
Hız: −3 (Sadece Hür Tacir'in sancak gemisi)
Vuruş olasılığı: −%25
Menzil: −3
